channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientLinux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientLinux

item.title: CVE-2021-44167|2024-10-22T20:57:17.576Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20forticlientlinux
item.description: An incorrect permission assignment for critical resource vulnerability [CWE-732] in FortiClient for Linux version 6.0.8 and below, 6.2.9 and below, 6.4.7 and below, 7.0.2 and below may allow an unauthenticated attacker to access sensitive information in log files and directories via symbolic links.
